timeline.message:
refactoring: remove JAVA modelling of channels

Signed-off-by: Alexander Friese <af944580@googlemail.com>

improved code quality: fixes due to compiler warnings

Signed-off-by: Alexander Friese <af944580@googlemail.com>

timeline.bodyText: Is the cast to Type necessary?
timeline.author: fwolter

replies.bodyText: you are right, this does not make any sense. It is a c&p mistake.
replies.author: alexf2015

timeline.bodyText: Null annotations on inner classes are not necessary. There is a bug in checkstyle, generating a false positive warning, which can safely be ignored. Same for the others.
timeline.author: fwolter

replies.bodyText:
I recognized that there are some differences between warnings shown by Eclipse and those shown by the mvn build process.
But I thought that Eclipse was wrong. I will remove these.
replies.author: alexf2015

timeline.author: fwolter

replies.bodyText: Hmm it seems that I have overlooked this. In the other transformer class I solved it exactly like you suggested.
replies.author: alexf2015
